content.text: 6 frozen prepared bean and cheese burritos
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "6 frozen prepared bean and cheese burritos" )
( ing-1 "2 tablespoons butter or margarine" )
( ing-2 "3 tablespoons all-purpose flour" )
( ing-3 "1 3/4 cups water" )
( ing-4 "1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce" )
( ing-5 "1 1/2 teaspoons chili powder" )
( ing-6 "1 teaspoon beef bouillon granules" )
( ing-7 "3/4 teaspoon ground cumin" )
( ing-8 "1/2 teaspoon salt" )

content.text: 2 cups shredded Mexican blend cheese or Cheddar cheese
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "2 cups shredded Mexican blend cheese or Cheddar cheese" )

content.text: 1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced ripe olives, drained
content.eamr: ( ing-10 "1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced ripe olives, drained" )
( ing-11 "1/3 cup chopped green onions" )

content.text: 0) Place frozen burritos in a greased 13-in baking dish; set aside.
2) Stir in flour until smooth; gradually stir in water.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "flour"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until smooth"@17:29 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "stir in"@41:48 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "water"@49:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
4) Add the tomato sauce, chili powder, bouillon, cumin and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
   :inform ( "Add"@3:6 / AC
      :ppt ( ing-4 "the tomato sauce"@7:23 / FOOD )
      :ppt( NULL / FOOD )
      :ppt ( ing-5 "chili powder"@25:37 / FOOD )
      :ppt ( ing-6 "bouillon"@39:47 / FOOD )
      :ppt ( ing-7 "cumin"@49:54 / FOOD )
      :ppt ( ing-8 "salt"@59:63 / FOOD )
   )
)

content.text: 5) Simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until thickened.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Simmer"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "5 minutes"@26:35 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until thickened"@39:54 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Sprinkle with cheese, olives if desired and onions.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Sprinkle"@3:11 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "cheese"@17:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "olives"@25:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "onions"@47:53 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F (176 degrees C) for 35-40 minutes or until heated through.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-8-0 "350 degrees F"@23:36 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-8-1 "176 degrees C"@-1:-1 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-8-0 "35-40 minutes"@41:54 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-8-0 "until heated through"@58:78 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
